attributes.review: I open this app only to drop it to the floor. The sheer energy coming from the baked orange was giving my phone a heart attack. I had to then call 911 and give it CPR while waiting for the ambulance. I do not recommend this app to anyone who loves their phone. Mine is fine now, though, and is seeing a therapist to get over the trauma.
